item.title: 独家报道消息人士称华为芯片合作伙伴 SiCarrier 寻求 28 亿美元融资
item.description: 与华为关系密切的中国芯片设备制造商 SiCarrier 正在其首轮融资中寻求 28 亿美元的资金，两位熟悉该计划的人士表示，这家初创公司正在寻求更多的客户和影响力。【原文：SiCarrier, a Chinese chip equipment maker with close links to Huawei, is seeking $2.8 billion in its maiden fundraising round, two people familiar with the plans said, as the startup chases more clients and clout.】

item.title: 因沙特芯片交易股价大涨，英伟达首席执行官净资产接近 1200 亿美元
item.description: 本周二，英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋的个人净资产从去年的 800 亿美元跃升至约 1 200 亿美元。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang's personal net worth jumped to around $120 billion on Tuesday, up from $80 billion last year, as a boom in demand for the company's artificial intelligence chips has powered a steep rally in its shares.】

item.title: 受人工智能服务器需求影响，富士康第一季度利润有望强劲增长
item.description: 台湾富士康是全球最大的合约电子制造商，预计将于周三公布第一季度利润跃升 72%，原因是人工智能服务器的需求持续强劲。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker, is expected to report on Wednesday that first-quarter profit leapt 72% on continued strong demand for artificial intelligence servers.】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级银行 CBA 第三季度现金利润增长，利润率稳定
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）周三公布，受贷款量增长和交易收入增加的帮助，第三季度现金收益上升。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia reported a rise in third-quarter cash earnings on Wednesday, helped by growth in lending volumes and higher trading income.】

item.title: 乌克兰副总理表示，乌克兰已完成与美国达成矿产交易的步骤
item.description: 乌克兰第一副总理周二表示，乌克兰已完成与美国达成的矿产开采协议的执行程序，包括投资基金的运作。【原文：Ukraine has concluded procedures for implementation of a deal with the United States on exploiting minerals, including the operation of an investment fund, the country's first deputy prime minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西努班克第一季度调整后净利润增长 37
item.description: 经营巴西数字贷款公司 Nubank 的上市实体 Nu Holdings 周二公布，其调整后净利润同比增长 37%，略低于分析师的预期。【原文：Nu Holdings , the listed entity which runs Brazilian digital lender Nubank, posted on Tuesday a 37% increase in its adjusted net profit from a year earlier, slightly missing analysts' estimates.】

item.title: 巴西 JBS 公司第一季度盈利 5.21 亿美元
item.description: 全球最大的肉类加工企业 JBS 周二公布，第一季度净利润为 29.2 亿雷亚尔（5.21 亿美元），符合分析师预计的 29.2 亿雷亚尔实际净利润，年增长率近 78%。【原文：JBS , the world's largest meatpacker, on Tuesday reported a net profit of 2.92 billion reais ($521 million) in the first quarter, in line with analysts' estimates of a 2.92 billion real net profit and a nearly 78% annual increase.】

item.title: 交易日：没有 "贸易休战 "宿醉，狂欢仍在继续
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 佛蒙特州州长暂停电动汽车要求
item.description: 本周二，佛蒙特州州长菲尔-斯科特（Phil Scott）暂停了该州对乘用车、中型和重型卡车的电动汽车销售要求，因为人们对加州率先推出的零排放汽车规定的可行性存在更广泛的担忧。【原文：Vermont Governor Phil Scott paused the state's electric vehicle sales requirements for passenger cars and medium and heavy-duty trucks on Tuesday, amid broader concerns about the feasibility of zero-emission vehicle rules pioneered by California.】

item.title: 为挽救拜登的清洁能源税收抵免政策而进行的最后一次游说活动
item.description: 美国能源产业贸易团体在最后一刻发起游说攻势，敦促国会议员在共和党预算计划中不砍掉前总统乔-拜登提出的一系列清洁能源税收抵免措施。【原文：U.S. energy industry trade groups have launched a last-minute lobbying blitz to urge Congress members to spare a slew of former President Joe Biden's clean energy tax credits from the chopping block in the Republican budget plan.】

item.title: 墨西哥希望《美国与墨西哥关于建立更紧密经贸关系的协定》（USMCA）的早期审查能为投资者和消费者提供清晰的信息
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长周二表示，墨西哥希望在今年下半年提前开始审查与美国和加拿大的三边贸易协定，以便为消费者和投资者提供清晰的信息。【原文：Mexico hopes to start a review of its trilateral trade agreement with the U.S. and Canada in the second half of this year, ahead of schedule, to provide clarity to consumers and investors, the nation's economy minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 西南航空公司申请扩大国际航线网络
item.description: 美国西南航空公司周二向美国运输部提交了申请，要求授权该公司飞往与美国签订了开放天空航空协议的任何国家。【原文：Southwest Airlines on Tuesday filed with the U.S. Department of Transportation for authority to fly to any country with which the U.S. has an Open Skies aviation agreement.】

item.title: 美国消费者监督机构提前取消丰田和解协议
item.description: 据美国消费者金融保护局公布的文件显示，该局已取消了与丰田汽车融资部门达成的 2023 年和解协议，原因是该汽车巨头被指控非法引导成千上万的消费者购买昂贵且不需要的捆绑产品。【原文：The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has canceled a 2023 settlement with the financing arm of Toyota over allegations the auto giant illegally steered thousands of consumers into costly and unwanted product bundles, according to documents published by the agency.】

item.title: 美国鹰撤销年度目标，减记春夏季库存
item.description: 由于宏观经济的不确定性，American Eagle Outfitters 周二撤回了其年度预测，并表示第一季度因春夏季商品减记而产生了约 7500 万美元的库存费用。【原文：American Eagle Outfitters on Tuesday withdrew its annual forecasts due to macroeconomic uncertainty and said it took a roughly $75 million inventory charge in the first quarter related to the write-down of its spring and summer merchandise.】

item.title: 数字银行初创公司 Chime 申请在美国上市
item.description: 周二的一份监管文件显示，金融科技和数字银行初创公司 Chime 已申请在美国首次公开募股。【原文：Financial technology and digital banking startup Chime filed for a U.S. initial public offering, a regulatory filing showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道德意志交易所和泛欧交易所加大力度打击 IPO 流向美国的现象
item.description: 面对美国的竞争，欧洲两大证券交易所运营商正加大力度挽留本地的首次公开募股，通过营销和研究来挑战纽约上市公司估值较高的观念。【原文：Two of Europe's major stock exchange operators are stepping up efforts to retain local initial public offerings in the face of U.S. competition, with marketing and research challenging the perception that New York-listed companies fetch higher valuations.】

item.title: 戴姆勒下调全年运营利润预期
item.description: 全球最大的卡车制造商之一戴姆勒卡车公司周二以需求不确定性增加为由，下调了 2025 年的营业利润预期。【原文：Daimler Truck , one of the world's biggest truckmakers, cut its operating profit forecast for 2025 on Tuesday, citing heightened demand uncertainty.】

item.title: 特朗普呼吁美联储降息，称 "几乎所有商品 "的价格都在下跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二再次呼吁美联储降低利率，并称汽油、日用品和 "几乎所有其他东西 "的价格都在下降。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday repeated his call for the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates, saying prices for gas, groceries and "practically everything else" are down.】

item.title: 对冲基金在中美贸易协议引发的涨势中收益甚微
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）周二的一份报告显示，周一中美达成关税协议引发华尔街股市大涨，全球对冲基金从中获得的收益有限。【原文：Global hedge funds reaped limited gains from a big Wall Street stock rally triggered by a U.S.-China agreement on tariffs on Monday, a Morgan Stanley note on Tuesday showed.】

item.title: 科佩克称中国纸浆市场面临美国关税挑战
item.description: 智利工业企业集团 Empresas Copec 周二表示，如果造纸企业在美国关税政策的不确定性下努力提高销售额，那么其林业产品的中国市场可能会变得更具挑战性。【原文：Chilean industrial conglomerate Empresas Copec said on Tuesday that the Chinese market for its forestry products could become more challenging if paper makers struggle to boost sales amid uncertainty over U.S. tariff policies.】

item.title: 英特尔首席财务官称客户对最新芯片制造技术的承诺有限
item.description: 英特尔公司财务总监大卫-津斯纳（David Zinsner）周二表示，英特尔公司利用即将推出的制造技术为外部客户生产的处理器数量目前 "并不多"。【原文：The volume of processors Intel is set to produce for external customers using its upcoming manufacturing technology is currently "not significant", finance chief David Zinsner said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司高管称，该公司可能要到 2027 年或 28 年才能获得波音 737 MAX 10 型飞机
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）的一位高管周二表示，由于波音737 MAX 10何时获批使用尚不确定，该公司可能要到2027年或2028年才能接收该飞机。【原文：United Airlines may not take delivery of the Boeing 737 MAX 10 until 2027 or 2028 because of uncertainty about when the plane will be approved for use, an executive for the carrier said Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧盟报告显示，俄罗斯经济状况比莫斯科说的更糟
item.description: 斯德哥尔摩转型经济研究所（SITE）周二发布的一份报告称，由于向战争模式的转变以及西方对莫斯科入侵乌克兰的制裁，俄罗斯经济正处于日益不稳定的状态。【原文：The Russian economy is in an increasingly precarious state as a result of a shift to a war mode and of Western sanctions over Moscow's invasion of Ukraine, a report by the Stockholm Institute of Transition Economics (SITE) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 从高管被杀到网络攻击，UnitedHealth 一波三折
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）首席执行官安德鲁-威蒂（Andrew Witty）意外卸任，公司资深人士斯蒂芬-赫姆斯利（Stephen Hemsley）将重返高层，带领这家医疗保健集团度过最具挑战性的时期之一。【原文：UnitedHealth Group CEO Andrew Witty has stepped down unexpectedly and company veteran Stephen Hemsley is returning to the top role to steer the healthcare conglomerate through one of its most challenging periods.】

item.title: 大众品牌首席执行官告诉英国《金融时报》，德国削减成本的行动使工厂成本下降了 13
item.description: 大众品牌首席执行官托马斯-舍费尔（Thomas Schaefer）在周二举行的一次会议上告诉《金融时报》，大众去年 12 月与工会签署的德国成本削减计划迄今已使工厂成本平均削减了 13%。【原文：Volkswagen's cost-cutting programme in Germany, signed off with unions last December, has so far led to an average cut in factory costs of 13%, brand CEO Thomas Schaefer told the Financial Times at a conference on Tuesday.】

item.title: Verizon 未来 5 年将向美国小企业供应商投资 50 亿美元
item.description: Verizon 周二表示，将在未来五年内向美国的小企业供应商投资 50 亿美元，以促进国内供应链的发展。【原文：Verizon said on Tuesday it would invest $5 billion over the next five years in small business suppliers in the U.S. with the goal of boosting domestic supply chains.】

item.title: 赫兹季度业绩不及华尔街预期，股价暴跌
item.description: 赫兹全球公司（Hertz Global）周二股价下跌超过 20%，原因是该公司因车队减少和预订量放缓而导致业绩未达华尔街预期。【原文：Shares of Hertz Global fell more than 20% on Tuesday after the rental car company's results missed Wall Street expectations due to reduced vehicle fleet and a moderation in bookings.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国考虑让阿联酋购买超过一百万片先进的英伟达芯片
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，特朗普政府正在权衡一项协议，该协议将允许阿联酋进口超过一百万片先进的英伟达芯片，这一数量远远超过了拜登时代人工智能芯片法规的限制。【原文：The Trump administration is weighing a deal that would allow the UAE to import more than a million advanced Nvidia chips, a quantity that far exceeds limits under Biden-era AI chip regulations, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 开云集团首席执行官称美国消费面临下降
item.description: Gucci 的所有者开云集团（Kering）首席执行官弗朗索瓦-亨利-皮诺（Francois-Henri Pinault）周二在议会听证会上告诉法国参议员，美国对其奢侈品和时尚产品的需求急剧下降。【原文：Gucci-owner Kering has seen a stark decline of demand for its luxury and fashion goods in the United States, its Chief Executive Francois-Henri Pinault told French senators at a parliamentary hearing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普海湾之行的中心议题是交易
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二从沙特阿拉伯获得了 6000 亿美元的投资承诺，此前这个石油大国在他开始海湾国家之行时为他铺上了红地毯。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump secured a $600 billion commitment from Saudi Arabia on Tuesday to invest in the United States after the oil power rolled out the red carpet for him at the start of a tour of Gulf states.】
